FormTests.java 
package NewTests;

import org.junit.Test;
import org.openqa.selenium.By;
import org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver;
import org.openqa.selenium.chrome.ChromeDriver;

public class FormTests {

        @Test
        public void testcreateusers(){
        System.setProperty("webdriver.chrome.driver", "C:\\Users\\robso\\Drivers\\chromedriver.exe");
        WebDriver driver = new ChromeDriver();


        //Creating the test cases to the project "Automation with Batista".
        // Scope: The purpose this project is to create an automation testing to easy the manuals activities.

         //Open the browser = https://automacaocombatista.herokuapp.com/treinamento/home
          driver.get("https://automacaocombatista.herokuapp.com/treinamento/home");

         //Click on form that contain the field called "Formulário"
            driver.findElement(By.linkText("Formulário")).click();

          //Click on form that is in form called "Formulário" using the xpath = //a[@href='/users/new']
            driver.findElement(By.xpath("//a[@href='/users/new']")).click();

          //Fill in field called "Nome" that contain the ID = user_name
            driver.findElement(By.id("user_name")).sendKeys("Robson");

          //Fill in field called "Último Nome" that contain the ID = user_lastname
            driver.findElement(By.id("user_lastname")).sendKeys("Laurindo");

          //Fill in field called "email" that contain the ID = user_email
            driver.findElement(By.id("user_email")).sendKeys("robsonl.laurindo@gmail.com");

          //Fill in field called "Endereço" that contain the ID = user_address
            driver.findElement(By.id("user_address")).sendKeys("Rua da Constituição, 01");

          //Fill in field called "Universidade" that contain the ID = user_university
            driver.findElement(By.id("user_university")).sendKeys("Faculdade Impacta de Tecnologia");

          //Fill in field called "Profissão" that contain the ID = user_profile
            driver.findElement(By.id("user_profile")).sendKeys("QA Tester");

          //Fill in field called "Gênero" that contain the ID = user_gender
            driver.findElement(By.id("user_gender")).sendKeys("Masculino");

          //Fill in field called "Idade" that contain the ID = user_age
            driver.findElement(By.id("user_age")).sendKeys("33");

          //Click on button "Criar" that contain the NAME = commit
            driver.findElement(By.name("commit")).click();
    }
}
